ground_truth: Harry gives a shrug of his head, as David's lips part, his gaze thoughtful. The young politician blinks his deep-set eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression wistful, as he stares across the warehouse. David presses his lips together. Later, they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door, where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob. Passing through the door, they enter a spacious white gallery with paintings on the walls. The human obeys, agog. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling. Peter, on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur, Harry leads David to another door, and David puts his hand on the agent's shoulder. Harry leads him into a service tunnel with pipework along the walls, and David obeys, gawking at the jarring change in location, and follows his guide down the damp corridor. They follow an enormous insulated pipe then descend a short flight of steps, as Harry crosses the floor and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door. Turning the knob counterclockwise, he opens it. They glimpse a stoic figure and a fedora passing by as he shuts the door behind him, and David gazes after him. Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist. Harry returns to the pumping station with a briefcase and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He takes two ledgers from the briefcase, handing one to David. As they confer, we watch Elise dance. Elsie drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down, resting her hands on her abdomen. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him. Pursing his lips, he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods, as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops plummet at us, and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse, Adrian faces a petite clerk. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station, Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath. As he climbs the spiral stairway, Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway, sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Harry gives a slight shrug of his head, a subtle movement that conveys a mix of resignation and acceptance, as David's lips part slightly, his gaze becoming thoughtful and introspective. The young politician blinks his deep-set eyes slowly, as if trying to clear his mind, and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression turning wistful as he stares across the vast expanse of the warehouse. David presses his lips together firmly, a gesture of determination or perhaps restraint. Later, they walk along a covered outdoor walkway, their footsteps echoing softly, and come to a stop at a door. Here, Harry reaches out and takes hold of the side door's knob with a firm grip. As they pass through the door, they enter a spacious white gallery, where paintings adorn the walls, each piece adding color and life to the otherwise stark space. The human, overwhelmed by the sight, obeys and follows, agog at the transformation of their surroundings. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling, casting intriguing shadows. Peter, positioned on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur, watches as Harry leads David to another door. David, feeling a sense of camaraderie, places his hand on the agent's shoulder. Harry guides him into a service tunnel, where pipework lines the walls, creating a stark contrast to the gallery they just left. David, still processing the jarring change in location, gawks at the industrial setting and follows his guide down the damp corridor. They continue along, following an enormous insulated pipe, then descend a short flight of steps. Harry crosses the floor with purpose and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door. With a deliberate motion, he turns the knob counterclockwise and opens it. As they step through, they catch a glimpse of a stoic figure in a fedora passing by, and as Harry shuts the door behind him, David gazes after the mysterious figure. Meanwhile, Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist, ready to engage in her own journey. Harry returns to the pumping station, carrying a briefcase, and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He opens the briefcase and takes out two ledgers, handing one to David. As they confer over the ledgers, we watch Elise dance, her movements fluid and expressive. Elise then drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down, resting her hands on her abdomen, a moment of vulnerability and reflection. Harry, observing the scene, smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him, trying to decipher his thoughts. Pursing his lips, David shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod, acknowledging the unspoken understanding between them. With his lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods in return, as David regards him impensively, contemplating the weight of their actions. Elise steps out from the dance studio into the cool night air and makes her way down the sidewalk, her mind perhaps still lingering on the dance. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city, casting a somber mood. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops plummet towards us, and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park, a scene of solitude and reflection. Now at the courthouse, Adrian faces a petite clerk, ready to address whatever business brought him there. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly, her thoughts perhaps elsewhere. In the pumping station, Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles warmly and gives David his fedora, a gesture of trust and encouragement. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath, steeling himself for what lies ahead. As he climbs the spiral stairway, Harry gazes after him, a silent supporter. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble, quickly regaining his balance, and dashes down a rainy alleyway, his feet splashing through puddles. He sprints across a busy street, narrowly avoiding cars that honk and swerve to miss him, driven by urgency and determination.

test_cases.description: Harry gives a shrug of his head, as David's lips part, his gaze thoughtful. The young politician, known for his recent campaign to reform local government policies, blinks his deep-set eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression wistful, as he stares across the abandoned warehouse that was once a bustling textile factory in the 1960s. David presses his lips together. Later, they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door, where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob, designed in an ornate Victorian style. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling, a replica of the famous Tyrannosaurus rex on display. Peter, an art curator with a keen eye for historical artifacts, stands on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur. Harry leads David to another door, and David puts his hand on the agent's shoulder. They follow an enormous insulated pipe then descend a short flight of steps, as Harry crosses the floor and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door, which creaks ominously. Turning the knob counterclockwise, he opens it. They glimpse a stoic figure and a fedora, reminiscent of the classic noir detective style, passing by as he shuts the door behind him, and David gazes after him. Now Elise, a talented dancer recognized for her innovative choreography, arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist. Harry returns to the pumping station, a crucial part of the city's infrastructure ensuring flood prevention, with a briefcase and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them. He takes two ledgers from the briefcase, handing one to David. As they confer, we watch Elise dance with fluid grace. Elise drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down, resting her hands on her abdomen. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him. Pursing his lips, he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods, as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air, which is crisp and cool, and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds, signaling an approaching storm, passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, an enigmatic government agency, raindrops plummet at us, and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park, a historic public space in New York City. Now at the courthouse, a grand structure built in the early 20th century, Adrian faces a petite clerk. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station, Harry and David reach a spiral staircase, a testament to the building's architectural uniqueness. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora, a personal item that symbolizes trust. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath. As he climbs the spiral stairway, Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway, sprinting across a busy street in midtown Manhattan where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. As they confer we watch Elise dance. Elsie drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down resting her hands on her abdomen. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down while David stares at him. Pursing his lips he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight. Harry takes a deep breath and nods as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise raindrops plummet at us and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse Adrian faces a petite clerk Clad in a flowing black halter dress. Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station Harry and David reach a spiral staircase. Harry smiles and gives David his fedora. Under the officer's kind gaze. David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath As he climbs the spiral stairway Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him.

Later, they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door, where the parrot takes hold of a side door's knob. Its lips pressed tight, the parrot takes a deep breath and nods, as the squirrel regards impensively. Max steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes its way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops plummet at us, and rain soaks the parrot's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse, the owl faces a petite clerk. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Max arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the pumping station, the parrot and the squirrel reach a spiral staircase. As it climbs the spiral stairway, the parrot gazes after it. The squirrel bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway, sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting it.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Harry gives a shrug of his shoulders, as David's lips part, his gaze thoughtful. The young politician blinks his deep-set eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze, his expression wistful, as he stares across the aircraft hangar. David presses his lips together. Later, they follow a covered garden path and stop at a gate, where Harry takes hold of a side gate's latch. Passing through the gate, they enter a spacious white atrium with sculptures on the walls. The human obeys, agog. In an upper atrium, a partial whale skeleton hangs from the ceiling. Peter, on an upper level overlooking the whale, Harry leads David to another gate, and David puts his hand on the agent's shoulder. Harry leads him into a maintenance passage with cable conduits along the walls, and David obeys, gawking at the jarring change in location, and follows his guide down the damp corridor. They follow an enormous insulated cable then descend a short flight of steps, as Harry crosses the floor and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten hatch. Turning the latch counterclockwise, he opens it. They glimpse a stoic figure and an umbrella passing by as he shuts the hatch behind him, and David gazes after him. Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Art Studio and faces a receptionist. Harry returns to the water treatment plant with a satchel and leads David to a utility junction where a wooden workbench awaits them. He takes two notebooks from the satchel, handing one to David. As they confer, we watch Elise paint. Elsie drops warily onto her knees and lies down, resting her hands on her cheeks. Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down, while David stares at him. Pursing his lips, he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod. His lips pressed tight, Harry takes a deep breath and nods, as David regards impensively. Elise steps from the art studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of ash gray clouds passes over the city. As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau skyscraper, raindrops plummet at us, and rain soaks Harry's statue in Madison Square Park. Now at the convention center, Adrian faces a petite usher. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly. In the water treatment plant, Harry and David reach a spiral ramp. Harry smiles and gives David his umbrella. Under the officer's kind gaze, David sets the umbrella on his shoulder and takes a controlled breath. As he climbs the spiral ramp, Harry gazes after him. David bursts out a gate with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway, sprinting across a bustling plaza where bicycles narrowly avoid hitting him.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Harry nods his head, as David's lips close, his gaze curious. The young politician closes his deep-set eyes and turns his heartbroken gaze, his expression pensive, as he glances across the warehouse. David puckers his lips. Later, they wander along a covered outdoor walkway and pause at a door, where Harry tugs on a side door's knob. Stepping through the door, they emerge into a spacious white gallery with paintings on the walls. The human hesitates, intrigued. In an upper gallery, a partial dinosaur skeleton hovers from the ceiling. Peter, on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur, Harry guides David to another door, and David taps his hand on the agent's shoulder. Harry directs him into a service tunnel with pipework along the walls, and David hesitates, marveling at the jarring change in location, and trails his guide down the damp corridor. They trail an enormous insulated pipe then ascend a short flight of steps, as Harry strolls across the floor and ascends a steep flight of steps to a rust-eaten door. Twisting the knob counterclockwise, he shuts it. They glimpse a stoic figure and a fedora wandering past as he closes the door behind him, and David glances after him. Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and greets a receptionist. Harry returns to the pumping station with a briefcase and guides David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable invites them. He retrieves two ledgers from the briefcase, offering one to David. As they discuss, we watch Elise dance. Elise shifts warily onto her buttocks and reclines, placing her hands on her abdomen. Harry smirks to himself and lays his plan book down, while David observes him. Pressing his lips, he averts his gaze and offers a stoic nod. His lips closed tight, Harry exhales deeply and nods, as David contemplates silently. Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and walks her way down the sidewalk. At dawn, a thick blanket of lead gray clouds sweeps over the city. As we look out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise, raindrops cascade at us, and rain dampens Harry's bench in Madison Square Park. Now at the courthouse, Adrian approaches a petite clerk. Clad in a flowing black halter dress, Elise arrives with a friend and gazes blankly. In the pumping station, Harry and David find a spiral staircase. Harry grins and hands David his fedora. Under the officer's gentle gaze, David places the fedora on his head and exhales a measured breath. As he ascends the spiral stairway, Harry watches after him. David crashes out a door with a brief trip and races down a rainy alleyway, darting across a busy street where cars barely avoid colliding with him.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The pineapple gives a shrug of its knee, as the cupcake's nostrils part, its stare thoughtful. The tiny librarian blinks its shallow-set nostrils and shifts its jubilant stare, its expression gleeful, as it gazes across the barn. The cupcake presses its nostrils together. Later, they follow a covered indoor elevator and stop at a window, where the pineapple takes hold of a basement window's latch. Passing through the window, they enter a cramped green garage with statues on the floors. The bicycle obeys, agog. In a lower garage, a complete lizard statue hangs from the fireplace. The chair, on a lower level overlooking the lizard, the pineapple leads the cupcake to another window, and the cupcake puts its foot on the biker's elbow. The pineapple leads it into a maintenance backyard with bushes along the floors, and the cupcake obeys, gawking at the soothing change in landscape, and follows its mentor down the arid hallway. They follow a tiny electrified cable then descend a brief tower of ladders, as the pineapple crosses the carpet and climbs a gentle platform of ladders to a mint-eaten window. Turning the latch clockwise, it opens it. They glimpse a lively creature and a helmet passing by as it shuts the window behind it, and the cupcake gazes after it. Now the onion arrives at the Maple Tree Art Studio and faces a barista. The pineapple returns to the swimming pool with a handbag and leads the cupcake to a maintenance intersection where a cardboard kitchen counter awaits them. It takes two maps from the handbag, handing one to the cupcake. As they ponder, we watch the onion paint. The onion drops cautiously onto its claws and lies down, resting its feet on its back. The pineapple smiles to itself and sets its scheme card down, while the cupcake stares at it. Pursing its nostrils, it shifts its stare and gives a jubilant wink. Its nostrils pressed loose, the pineapple takes a shallow breath and winks, as the cupcake regards carelessly. The onion steps from the art studio into the night fog and makes its way down the trail. At dusk, a thick blanket of copper red balloons passes over the village. As we peer out the edge of the Adjustment Bureau cabin, chocolates plummet at us, and jelly soaks the pineapple's sofa in Liberty Circle Park. Now at the pharmacy, the koala faces a tiny baker. Clad in a torn black apron, the onion arrives with a sibling and stares brightly. In the swimming pool, the pineapple and the cupcake reach a square staircase. The pineapple smiles and gives the cupcake its helmet. Under the painter's tiny stare, the cupcake sets the helmet on its toes and takes a deep breath. As it climbs the square ladderway, the pineapple gazes after it. The cupcake bursts out a window with a brief tumble and dashes down a sunny highway, sprinting across an empty meadow where snails narrowly avoid hitting it.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Johnny nods his shoulder, as Michael's eyes close, his expression thoughtful. The elderly librarian yawns his bright blue eyes and twists his amused grin, his look puzzled, as he surveys across the museum. Michael bites his tongue together. Later, they meander along a crowded indoor corridor and pause at a window, where Johnny releases a large window's latch. Slipping through the window, they find themselves in a narrow blue atrium with sculptures on the pedestals. The cat listens, intrigued. In a lower atrium, a complete whale skeleton descends from the floor. Lucy, on a lower deck observing the whale, Johnny escorts Michael to another window, and Michael places his foot on the guard's ankle. Johnny guides him into a storage hall with cables lining the floors, and Michael listens, marveling at the striking shift in scenery, and trails his escort through the dry passageway. They trail an enormous supporting column then ascend a long ramp of stairs, as Johnny circles the ceiling and descends a wide ramp of stairs to a copper-tinted window. Cranking the latch clockwise, he seals it. They catch sight of a joyful contour and a beret wandering by as he locks the window behind him, and Michael watches after him. Now Sarah arrives at the Maple Grove Poetry Library and greets a librarian. Johnny departs from the reservoir with a backpack and guides Michael to a service alcove where a wooden chair beckons them. He extracts two notebooks from the backpack, passing one to Michael. As they discuss, we observe Sarah recite. Sarah lowers cautiously onto her knees and sits back, placing her arms on her lap. Johnny grins to himself and places his calendar down, while Michael peers at him. Biting his tongue, he turns his expression and gives a cheerful salute. His tongue bitten hard, Johnny exhales a long breath and waves, as Michael observes pensively. Sarah steps from the poetry library into the morning breeze and loiters down the avenue. At sunset, a thin veil of dark purple mist drifts over the town. As we glance out the top of the Adjustment Bureau skyscraper, hailstones tumble toward us, and hailstones drench Johnny's fountain in Madison Square Park. Now at the university, Nathan meets a tall assistant. Clad in a shimmering red trench coat, Sarah arrives with a cousin and frowns sharply. In the reservoir, Johnny and Michael discover a straight staircase. Johnny grins and hands Michael his scarf. Under the teacher's gentle look, Michael places the scarf on his throat and exhales a steady breath. As he scales the straight stair, Johnny peers after him. Michael barges through a window with a brief skid and jogs up a bustling promenade, hurtling across a chaotic square where bicycles barely dodge colliding with him.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Harry gives a nod of his elbow, as David's fingers twitch, his gaze perplexed. The young politician taps his shallow-set ears and flips his disappointed grin, his expression dreamy, as he peers across the greenhouse. David bites his nails together. Later, they amble along a canopied indoor hallway and pause at a window, where Harry grasps a gate's hinge. Moving through the window, they enter a cozy blue atrium with photographs on the surfaces. The human follows, bemused. In an upper atrium, a partial whale skull dangles from the rafters. Peter, on an upper tier surveying the whale, Harry guides David to another window, and David places his nose on the agent's arm. Harry directs him into a utility shaft with wiring along the surfaces, and David follows, marveling at the surprising shift in scenery, and trails his navigator through the dry passageway. They trail an enormous exposed wire then rise a long rung of ladders, as Harry skims the ceiling and descends a wide row of ladders to a moss-covered window. Twisting the hinge clockwise, he slides it open. They catch sight of a cheerful animal and a baseball cap floating by as he closes the window behind him, and David studies after it. Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Art Studio and greets a vendor. Harry returns to the power station with a backpack and guides David to a maintenance crossroad where a cardboard platform awaits them. He removes two notebooks from the backpack, presenting one to David. As they discuss, we observe Elise paint. Elise sits gingerly onto her heels and leans back, resting her fingers on her chin. Harry giggles to himself and places his map book aside, while David studies him. Frowning, he redirects his vision and gives a thoughtful wave. His fingers clenched tight, Harry inhales deeply and waves, as David watches curiously. Elise strides from the art studio into the daylight and makes her way up the pathway. At midday, a fine layer of pastel blue fog drifts over the ocean. As we gaze out the edge of the Adjustment Bureau skyscraper, snowflakes drift down toward us, and snow covers Harry's seat in Madison Square Park. Now at the museum, Adrian confronts a towering statue. Clad in a tight red jacket, Elise arrives with an ally and gazes intently. In the power station, Harry and David mount a winding ladder. Harry chuckles and grants David his baseball cap. Under the officer's warm smile, David places the baseball cap on his nose and takes a deep breath. As he ascends the winding ladder, Harry watches after him. David bursts through a window with a slight trip and scurries down a snowy pathway, leaping across a quiet square where bicycles narrowly miss colliding with him.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Barney tosses a twitch of his elbow, as Claire's nostrils flare, her grin mischievous. The ancient historian squints his sunken cheeks and twists his jubilant grin, his demeanor enthusiastic, as he glances across the shipyard. Claire clicks her fingers apart. Later, they wander through a congested indoor bazaar and pause at a gate, where Barney grabs hold of a side gate's latch. Sliding through the gate, they step into a cramped red aviary with murals on the floor. The feline complies, puzzled. In a lower aviary, a full giraffe sculpture dangles from the floor. Oliver, on a lower tier overlooking the giraffe, Barney guides Claire to another gate, and Claire places her foot on the artist's elbow. Barney directs her into a heating duct with cables along the ceiling, and Claire complies, marveling at the thrilling shift in scenery, and trails her escort through the dry causeway. They trail a tiny uninsulated cable then ascend a long ladder of rungs, as Barney scuttles the ceiling and slides up a shallow ladder of rungs to a silver-painted gate. Twisting the latch clockwise, he shuts it. They spy a giggling creature and a parka floating by as he closes the gate behind her, and Claire gawks after her. Now Lori appears at the Maple Leaf Music Venue and challenges a librarian. Barney returns to the brewing station with a guitar case and guides Claire to a hardware intersection where a wooden planter greets them. He plucks two scrolls from the guitar case, tossing one to Claire. As they quarrel, we witness Lori sing. Lori hops cautiously onto her knees and sits up, resting her feet on her chest. Barney grins to himself and lays his sketchbook down, while Claire glares at her. Smirking with her teeth, she pivots her ears and gives a sly wink. Her teeth clenched tight, Barney inhales deeply and winks, as Claire observes absently. Lori strolls from the music venue into the dim room and creeps her path up the stairwell. At dusk, a thin layer of bright golden sunshine drifts under the forest. As we glance in the sky of the Adjustment Bureau low lake, snowflakes drift toward us, and snow envelops Barney's platform in Central Garden Plaza. Now at the stadium, Marcus confronts a bulky guard. Wrapped in a tattered blue jumpsuit, Lori enters with a sibling and frowns loosely. In the brewing station, Barney and Claire approach a crooked escalator. Barney grins and tosses Claire her parka. Under the vendor's cold glare, Claire wraps the parka under her chest and takes a shaky pause. As she slides the crooked escalator, Barney glares after her. Claire tumbles into a window with a graceful leap and strolls into a sunlit field, darting across a silent meadow where boulders stay oblivious of grazing.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Harry and David, a young politician, journey through a gallery, marveling at a dinosaur skeleton. Harry leads David into a service tunnel, navigating corridors that change drastically in appearance. They reach a cinderblock worktable where Harry gives David a ledger, and Elise, a dancer, appears at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio. Harry, while contemplating his plan, sees Elise dance, and David watches thoughtfully. Rain falls over the city as Harry sits in Madison Square Park. Elise, in a black halter dress, arrives at the courthouse. Harry gives David his fedora, offering encouragement. David, donning the fedora, ascends a spiral staircase and bursts into a rainy alley, narrowly dodging traffic.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: David bursts out a door with a brief stumble and dashes down a rainy alleyway sprinting across a busy street where cars narrowly avoid hitting him David sets the fedora on his head and takes a controlled breath As he climbs the spiral stairway Harry gazes after him  Under the officer's kind gaze  Harry smiles and gives David his fedora  In the pumping station Harry and David reach a spiral staircase  Elise arrives with a friend and stares blankly  Now at the courthouse Adrian faces a petite clerk Clad in a flowing black halter dress  As we peer out the side of the Adjustment Bureau high rise raindrops plummet at us and rain soaks Harry's bench in Madison Square Park  At dawn a thick blanket of lead gray clouds passes over the city  Elise steps from the dance studio into the night air and makes her way down the sidewalk  Harry takes a deep breath and nods as David regards impensively  His lips pressed tight  Pursing his lips he shifts his gaze and gives a stoic nod  Harry smiles to himself and sets his plan book down while David stares at him  Elsie drops warily onto her buttocks and lies down resting her hands on her abdomen  As they confer we watch Elise dance  He takes two ledgers from the briefcase handing one to David  Harry returns to the pumping station with a briefcase and leads David to a service junction where a cinderblock worktable awaits them  Now Elise arrives at the Cedar Lake Dance Studio and faces a receptionist  They glimpse a stoic figure and a fedora passing by as he shuts the door behind him and David gazes after him  Turning the knob counterclockwise he opens it  They follow an enormous insulated pipe then descend a short flight of steps as Harry crosses the floor and climbs a steep flight of steps to a rusteaten door  Harry leads him into a service tunnel with pipework along the walls and David obeys gawking at the jarring change in location and follows his guide down the damp corridor  Harry leads David to another door and David puts his hand on the agent's shoulder  Peter on an upper level overlooking the dinosaur  In an upper gallery a partial dinosaur skeleton hangs from the ceiling  The human obeys agog  Passing through the door they enter a spacious white gallery with paintings on the walls  Later they follow a covered outdoor walkway and stop at a door where Harry takes hold of a side door's knob  David presses his lips together  The young politician blinks his deepset eyes and shifts his heartbroken gaze his expression wistful as he stares across the warehouse  Harry gives a shrug of his head as David's lips part his gaze thoughtful
